title: Hellwing Bow
summaries: The Hellwing Bow is a bow found in Shadow Chests in the Underworld and in Obsidian Lock Boxes obtained from Obsidian and Hellstone Crates. All arrows are fired in a ~30Â° cone from the Hellwing Bow which causes it to be very inaccurate at long distances. In addition, Wooden Arrows are converted into Hellwings, flaming bat projectiles that travel in a semi-straight line, can pierce infinitely, and will dissipate once hitting a surface. All other arrow types are not converted and will retain their special properties.

statistics.Tooltip: Wooden arrows turn into flaming bats
